revised_title: An Explication of All the Inscriptions in the Palmyrene Language and Character
tldr: The author, John Swinton, investigates and deciphers Palmyrene inscriptions, providing translations and interpretations of various inscriptions found in the ruins of Palmyra. He also compares the Palmyrene alphabet with the Hebrew alphabet and provides a version of six Palmyrene inscriptions with corresponding Greek inscriptions, as well as four inscriptions without Greek counterparts.
